<!DOCTYPE html>

  <head>

   <title>
    关于通用数据保护规范的用户通知 | A Message to Our Users about GDPR Compliance
   </title>
   <style>
    * {
       margin: 0;
       padding: 0;
       box-sizing: border-box;
     }
     body {
       font-family: -apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Segoe UI","Helvetica Neue","PingFang SC","Noto Sans","Noto Sans CJK SC","Microsoft YaHei","微软雅黑",sans-serif;
       font-size: 14px;
       font-weight: normal;
       line-height: 1.42857143;
       color: #383838;
       background-color: #fff;
     }
     header {
       position: absolute;
       top: 0;
       width: 100%;
       background-color: transparent;
     }
     header .container {
       max-width: 1180px;
       height: 100%;
       margin: 0 auto;
       padding: 10px 20px;
     }
     .logo img {
       width: 140px;
     }
     .title {
       background-size: cover;
       background-repeat: no-repeat;
       background-image: url('http://dn-site.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/logos/vectorBanner.png');
     }
     .title .container {
       max-width: 700px;
       margin: 0 auto;
       padding: 124px 20px 52px;
     }
     .title h1 {
       color: #fff;
       font-weight: normal;
       font-size: 40px;
     }
     .title h4 {
       color: #fff;
       font-size: 16px;
       font-weight: normal;
     }
     article .container {
       max-width: 700px;
       min-height: calc(100vh - 560px);
       margin: 90px auto;
       padding: 0 20px;
       color: #808080;
     }
     article section {
       font-size: 16px;
       margin-bottom: 28px;
       font-weight: normal;
     }
     section a {
       color: #3DA8F5;
       text-decoration: none;
     }
     footer {
       padding: 0 20px;
 
     }
     footer .container {
       max-width: 1180px;
       margin: 24px auto;
       font-size: 12px;
       color: #A6A6A6;
       border-top: 1px solid #E5E5E5;
     }
     footer .copyright {
       padding: 38px 0;
     }
     span.dashed {
       display: block;
       width: 100%;
       height: 1px;
       margin-top: 40px;
       padding: 20px 0;
       border-top: 1px dashed #ccc;
     }
   </style>
  </head>
  <body>
   <header>
    <div class="container">
     <div class="logo">
      <img alt="teambition" src="http://dn-site.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/logos/logo-white.svg"/>
     </div>
    </div>
   </header>
   <div class="title">
    <div class="container">
     <h1>
      关于通用数据保护规范的用户通知
     </h1>
     <h4>
      A Message to Our Users about GDPR Compliance
     </h4>
    </div>
   </div>
   <article>
    <div class="container">
     <section>
      尊敬的用户您好，
     </section>
     <section>
      我们非常抱歉地宣布，由于 Teambition 目前尚未满足欧盟常规数据保护规定 (GDPR) 的要求，我们将从 2018 年 6 月 13 日起暂停对欧洲区用户的服务。届时，所有使用欧洲 IP 地址登录的用户将会受到影响。
     </section>
     <section>
      Teambition 正在积极采取应对措施来处理 GDPR 的合规性问题，相关内容可以
      <a href="http://help.teambition.net/%E6%9B%B4%E5%A4%9A%E8%B5%84%E6%BA%90/what-teambition-is-doing" target="_blank">
       点击链接
      </a>
      查看。对于受影响的用户和公司，我们也将尽快提供有效地解决方案，如暂停并延长账户的使用期直到我们重启服务或退费等。
     </section>
     <section>
      由此造成的任何不便，尽请谅解。
     </section>
     <section>
      如有任何问题，请通过邮箱：
      <a href="mailto:support@teambition.com">
       support@teambition.com
      </a>
      联系我们。
     </section>
     <span class="dashed">
     </span>
     <section>
      Dear Teambition Users,
     </section>
     <section>
      We are sorry to announce that starting from June 13, 2018, access to Teambition service will be temperarily unavailable for residents in Europe as we continually make changes in light of General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We apologize for any inconvenience this action may bring to you, and we intend to restore the service as soon as possible.
     </section>
     <section>
      You can contact us for refund, or choose to temporarily freeze your account until we make our service available to Europe again. Soon the detailed actions will be announced.
     </section>
     <section>
      If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us via
      <a href="mailto:support@teambition.com">
       support@teambition.com
      </a>
      .
     </section>
    </div>
   </article>
   <footer>
    <div class="container">
     <p class="copyright">
      Copyright © 2013-2018 Teambition 沪ICP备11014111号-2
     </p>
    </div>
   </footer>
